data.title: [Solved] Auguste Comte has given three stages of thinking for the dev

The correct answer is Positivistic. Key Points


	Auguste Comte, a French philosopher and sociologist, proposed a theory of societal development known as &
data.text:
-> The UGC NET City Intimation Link has been released for the exam scheduled from 21st to 23rd August 2024.

-> The re-exam for UGC NET June 2024 will be conducted in CBT Mode from 21st August to 4th September 2024.

-> The UGC-NET exam takes place for more than 80 subjects, to determine the eligibility for 'Junior Research Fellowship’ and ‘Assistant Professor’ posts.

-> The exam comprises two papers - Paper I and Paper II. Paper I consists of 50 questions and Paper II consists of 100 questions.
